description: This repository contains code for gathering and uploading KBase app errors from user job states in the catalog, workspace and execution engine. This repository is run through a cron job every night. The main function in the repo is get_errored_apps_EE2. The cron job calls the upload_errorlogs function that calls the main get_errored_apps_EE2 function.
name: KBase Error Logging
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
